Sure! Here is a job description for the position of "Social Media and Newsletter Marketing Coordinator" for Severin Travel Africa:

---

Job Title: Social Media and Newsletter Marketing Coordinator

Company Overview:
Severin Travel Africa is a travel company that offers unique and authentic travel experiences in Africa. Our mission is to provide our customers with unforgettable travel experiences while also promoting sustainable tourism practices in the destinations we visit.

Job Overview:
We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media and Newsletter Marketing Coordinator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing our social media presence, creating engaging content, and sending out our monthly newsletter to our subscribers.

Key Responsibilities:

* Create and implement a social media strategy that aligns with the company's marketing goals.
* Develop engaging content for our social media channels, including Instagram and Facebook.
* Post content twice per week on Instagram and Facebook and respond to messages and comments daily.
* Manage our Mailchimp account and send out our monthly newsletter to our subscribers.
* Write and create content for the newsletter, including articles and promotions.
* Manage and update our Wordpress website with new content, photos, and promotions.
* Edit images using Canva to create visually appealing social media posts and newsletter content.
* Monitor and analyze social media and newsletter metrics to optimize content and engagement.

Qualifications:

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* 2+ years of experience in social media and newsletter marketing.
* Excellent writing and communication skills.
* Proficiency in social media platforms, Mailchimp, and Wordpress.
* Experience with photo editing software, such as Canva.
* Knowledge of social media and newsletter analytics tools.
* Passion for travel and sustainability.

Salary:
The salary for this position will be competitive and commensurate with experience.

Benefits:

* Health insurance
* 401k plan
* Paid vacation time
* Travel opportunities

How to Apply:
To apply for this position, please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining why you would be a good fit for this role and Severin Travel Africa.
